mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(YEAR, '-', LPAD(MONTH, 2, '0'), '-', LPAD(DAY, 2, '0')) AS stat_day, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'B' THEN CHARGE_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS b_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'C' THEN CANCEL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS d_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'R' THEN REFUND_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS f_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'B' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS i_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'C' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS k_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS m_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'B' THEN CHARGE_AMOUNT ELSE NULL END) AS p_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'C' THEN CANCEL_AMOUNT ELSE NULL END) AS r_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'R' THEN REFUND_AMOUNT ELSE NULL END) AS t_stat FROM TB_AUTH_STATS_DAILY WHERE YEAR = #{year} AND MONTH = #{month} AND DAY = #{day} GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH, DAY
